🎬 RISE OF THE MERLIN Official Trailer (2026) | The Pendragon Cycle | 4K UHD
A legend awakens.
RISE OF THE MERLIN (2026) brings the ancient myths of The Pendragon Cycle to life in a breathtaking new reimagining of Britain’s earliest heroes.
Witness the origin of Merlin as prophecy, magic, and destiny collide—shaping the rise of kings, the fall of empires, and the birth of a legend who will change the world forever.

Experience stunning visuals, powerful performances, and epic world-building in crisp 4K UHD.
A new age of myth begins.

🐙 Film Overview:
In the aftermath of a secret military experiment gone wrong beneath the Barents Sea, a monstrous deep-sea entity — codenamed KRAKEN — awakens. As the Russian Navy scrambles to contain it, global powers are drawn into a terrifying mystery stretching back to Cold War secrets and ancient ocean myths. What they uncover is not just a beast… but a force of nature older than civilization.
